title: The Best Cinnamon Rolls
ingredients: ['Dough', '1 sachet of dried, fast action yeast', '125ml warm milk', '125ml warm cream', '100g granulated sugar', '5 tablespoons very soft butter or margarine', "1 teaspoon salt (don't add salt if butter is salted)", '2 eggs', '500g plain flour', '4 tablespoons cornflour', 'Filling', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '2 1/2 tablespoons cinnamon', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '5 tablespoons very soft butter or margarine', '70g raisins, nuts, chocolate chips (optional)', 'Icing', '110g butter or margarine', '175g icing sugar', '4 tablespoons cream cheese', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon vanilla']
